title: Help with key bindings
body: I have a small problem with key bindings, I used to change the input.ini file of the game to change left mouse click to be the mouse button 3 (scrolling button), And now after it was removed or the key bindings became pinned to every account I can't change it back or reset it which bothers me a little, any ideas?

replies.body:
Unfortunately, I'm unable to assist you in making changes to the game files, since we don't support doing so.

If you have any other questions or concerns, please let me know.
I figured it out and got it right, Thanks for your help anyway =)
